Description: A US-based company that is helping businesses to improve the lives of both the employees and the facilities management teams who are in charge of managing the workplace, is looking for a Senior Web Developer. The selected candidate will be responsible for improving the user experience of the front-end apps with their expertise and building solid code. The company is helping businesses to create productive and responsive work environments. The organization has been covered in the Wall Street Journal and named on Entrepreneur Magazine’s list of 100 brilliant companies as well. They have managed to raise $7mn+ in funding so far.
